name: plain-text-data-to-json
description: Transform a simple plain-text database to JSON
author: Titus Wormer <tituswormer@gmail.com>

scripts.test-travis: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks -u exports spec/plain-text-data-to-json.spec.js
scripts.lint: npm run lint-api && npm run lint-test && npm run lint-style
scripts.make: npm run lint && npm run coverage
